attributes.action: Cease all plans to fund political parties from the public purse, and to introduce a plain and simple law to make all donations public, direct and openly tied to the name of the donor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: State funding of political parties is a potentially hugely damaging and expensive hole for the UK taxpayer.   I wish to be able to support the political p[arty of my choice, and NOT all those who supposedly qualify.   NOT IN MY NAME!!!
